data.system_settings: Windows 10 Pro x64 Anniversary Update, Canary build 17316
data.actual_result: Once you open the channel settings the page defaults to its permissions, even if you don't have the Manage Roles permission
data.expected_result: You can't view the channel permissions
data.short_description: Channel permissions can be viewed without having the permission to do so
data.steps_to_repro: - Go into a server where you have both Manage Roles and Manage Channels permissions - Go to a channel's permissions - Now click out of it and go to a different server where you only have the Manage Channels permissions, but not Manage Roles - Go to a channel's settings in that server - See what happens
